attributes.action: Remove the charge to renew the photo card driving licence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It costs £17.50 to renew the photocard driving licence. How can it cost this much to replace a plastic card? Banks provide new credit and debit cards every couple of years withour charge so why is the DVLA different? This charge is a joke. Get rid of it.
